pullRequest.title: Unittest for MatrixBridge
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes: JENKINS-59603
Had a little trouble stubbing the chained function calls. Got a way around it. Happy to take remarks 😺

nodes.bodyText: Fields are not allowed in tests. Can you please refactor and inline in a method that is called by both tests? You may need to inline TaskListener.NULL and launcher as well.
We are using AssertJ in the whole project.

commit.message: fix: converted MatrixBridgeTest to assertj and fields to a method
